result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Atty Curran notes he has rec'd the information, waives reading and stands mute.  Court advises DE of charges/max penalties and enters NG pleas.  Bond continued.  22TR6048 to track.  Matter set for PTC/RD.

10:19 AM Defendant Dale A. Kuhnau in court.  Attorney Michael C. Curran in court for Dale A. Kuhnau.  Prosecuting attorney Gabriel David Arevalo in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Court states case and parties state appearances.  Atty Curran states DE will waive his right to prelim today.  DE agrees.  Court questions DE on prelim waiver/accepts/finds probable cause/binds DE over.

2:10 PM Defendant Dale A. Kuhnau in court.  Court questions DE on his petition.  DE applied for PD but was turned down.  Currently employed by Vivid in Spring Green.  Court finds DE is not conditionally indigent and denies his request for court-appointed counsel.  Court reminds DE of his upcoming court dates.

2:47 PM Defendant Dale A. Kuhnau appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Kathryn E Hayes appeared by video for Dale A. Kuhnau.  Prosecuting attorney Rick C Spoentgen in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant received and waives reading of complaint.  Court advises DE of charges/max penalties.  Advised of rights to an attorney.  DE needs to contact the PD's office to see if he qualifies.  Time limits waived for preliminary hearing.  State does not object to a signature bond.  No objection from Atty Hayes.  $1,000.00 SIGNATURE bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows:  Absolute sobriety while operating a motor vehicle.  Must submit chemical testing by law enforcement.
